import numpy as np

b_arr = [64 ,3,4,5,6,2,99,4,5,333,7,8,25, 12, 22, 11, 90,88,99,22,55,7,3,5,7]

def me_sort(arr): 
    cnt = len(b_arr)
    # array2d = np.empty((cnt, cnt), dtype=int)
    array2d = np.zeros((cnt, cnt), dtype=int)
    cnt = len(arr)  
    doloop= True
    loopcnt=0
    while doloop:     
            x=0
            y=cnt-1
            #（0，cnt-1）からstart
            array2d[x][y] = arr[0]
            print("x,y:",x,y)
            print("array2d[x][y]:",x,y,array2d[x][y])       
            for ind in range(1,cnt) :    
                if arr[ind]>arr[ind-1]:
                    #下に置く
                    array2d[x+1][y]=arr[ind]
                    x=x+1
                    print("array2d[x][y]:",x,y,array2d[x][y])
                else:
                    #左に置く
                    array2d[x][y-1]=arr[ind]
                    y=y-1
                    print("array2d[x][y]:",x,y,array2d[x][y])
            print("x,y:",x,y)
            # マスクを作成
            mask = array2d != 0
            # マスクを使って要素を取り出し、平坦化
            flat_array = array2d[mask].flatten()
            arr=np.array([]) 
            arr =np.append(arr,flat_array)
            #初期化
            array2d = np.zeros((cnt, cnt), dtype=int)
            print("arr:",arr)
            if y<cnt-1:
                doloop=True
            else :
                doloop=False
            
            print("doloop:",doloop)   
            loopcnt += 1
            if loopcnt >10 :
               doloop=False
            print("loopcnt:",loopcnt)   

 
print("b_arr:",b_arr)
me_sort(b_arr)

# array2d.tolist
